item.description: https://www.facebook.... http://www.revolution... Now is the time that tries men’s souls. A hard days work on the campaign trail couldn’t be better capped off than with fellow Ron Paul Supporters, a light case of frostbite, wa...rm food, cold drink, and the dream of victory. You can help us make that happen. We’d like to sponsor an event in New Hampshire so that we can all come together after a long week of knocking on doors and passing out literature. We need to raise $5000.00 to provide the grassroots sponsorship. Here are the details: When: Saturday, January 7, 2012 at 11:00am until Sunday, January 8, 2012 at 1:00am Where: Jillian’s Billiards Club of Manchester 50 Phillippe Cote Street Manchester, New Hampshire 03101 (603) 626-7636 THIS IS IT! Everything we’ve been working for will come down to New Hampshire. We need all the people we can get to come to New Hampshire and help campaign for Ron Paul. We’ll also be throwing a huge debate watch party which will include great speakers/performers and FREE food! Special Speakers / Performers Tom Woods Jordan Page Golden State More details will be announced as we get closer to the event.
item.name: RevolutionPAC's Boots On the Ground/Debate Party
